channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Unlimited PopUps
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Unlimited PopUps

item.title: CVE-2021-24631|2024-08-03T19:35:20.314Z -- unknown -- unlimited%20popups
item.description: The Unlimited PopUps WordPress plugin through 4.5.3 does not sanitise or escape the did GET parameter before using it in a SQL statement, available to users as low as editor, leading to an authenticated SQL Injection
